# SolMap

SolMap is a Python package for creating a postel projection of a standalone fits 
file for images of the sun.

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install requirements if this project is taken from Github.

```bash
pip install numpy
pip install numba
pip install astropy
```

## Usage
Run SolMap in the command line and give the inputs when prompted.
Requires a relative path to the fits file, either in the folder with the 
file name or the relative path to the file from SolMaps location.

```python
python main.py
```
